title: Tuna and Chickpea Salad
ingredients: ['1 tin tuna in olive oil, undrained', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained', '60g black olives, chopped', '1 or 2 tablespoons freshly chopped parsley', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '1 lemon, juiced', '60g feta cheese, or more to taste', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
